product_name: FalconGuides Touring Hot Springs California and Nevada - 3rd Edition
long_description: Touring Hot Springs California and Nevada offers more than 100 of the best sites for soaking--from primitive backcountry pools to hand-crafted bathhouses surrounded by civilization.
